00029 using namespace std;

00031 struct Edge;
00032 struct FileStat;
00033 struct Node;
00034 struct Rule;
00035 
00036 /// Interface for accessing the disk.
00037 ///
00038 /// Abstract so it can be mocked out for tests.  The real implementation
00039 /// is RealDiskInterface.
00040 struct DiskInterface {
00041   virtual ~DiskInterface() {}
00042 
00043   /// stat() a file, returning the mtime, or 0 if missing and -1 on
00044   /// other errors.
00045   virtual int Stat(const string& path) = 0;
00046   /// Create a directory, returning false on failure.
00047   virtual bool MakeDir(const string& path) = 0;
00048   /// Read a file to a string.  Fill in |err| on error.
00049   virtual string ReadFile(const string& path, string* err) = 0;
00050   /// Remove the file named @a path. It behaves like 'rm -f path' so no errors
00051   /// are reported if it does not exists.
00052   /// @returns 0 if the file has been removed,
00053   ///          1 if the file does not exist, and
00054   ///          -1 if an error occurs.
00055   virtual int RemoveFile(const string& path) = 0;
00056 
00057   /// Create all the parent directories for path; like mkdir -p
00058   /// `basename path`.
00059   bool MakeDirs(const string& path);
00060 };
00061 
00062 /// Implementation of DiskInterface that actually hits the disk.
00063 struct RealDiskInterface : public DiskInterface {
00064   virtual ~RealDiskInterface() {}
00065   virtual int Stat(const string& path);
00066   virtual bool MakeDir(const string& path);
00067   virtual string ReadFile(const string& path, string* err);
00068   virtual int RemoveFile(const string& path);
00069 };
00070 
00071 /// Global state (file status, loaded rules) for a single run.
00072 struct State {
00073   State();
00074 
00075   StatCache* stat_cache() { return &stat_cache_; }
00076 
00077   void AddRule(const Rule* rule);
00078   const Rule* LookupRule(const string& rule_name);
00079   Edge* AddEdge(const Rule* rule);
00080   Node* GetNode(const string& path);
00081   Node* LookupNode(const string& path);
00082   void AddIn(Edge* edge, const string& path);
00083   void AddOut(Edge* edge, const string& path);
00084   /// @return the root node(s) of the graph. (Root nodes have no output edges).
00085   /// @param error where to write the error message if somethings went wrong.
00086   vector<Node*> RootNodes(string* error);
00087 
00088   StatCache stat_cache_;
00089   /// All the rules used in the graph.
00090   map<string, const Rule*> rules_;
00091   /// All the edges of the graph.
00092   vector<Edge*> edges_;
00093   BindingEnv bindings_;
00094   struct BuildLog* build_log_;
00095 
00096   static const Rule kPhonyRule;
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif  // NINJA_NINJA_H_
